ygData.subject: which stat?
ygData.msgSnippet: I appeal to the wisdom of the group once again. I m a 15th level monk starting to assemble a nice set of armor, but I m a bit naive when it comes to jewelry.
ygData.messageBody:
I appeal to the wisdom of the group once again. I'm a 15th level monk
starting to assemble a nice set of armor, but I'm a bit naive when it comes
to jewelry. Which stat is more valuable to raise with jewelry, DEX or AGI?

I know agility affects hit points, and the earings I picked up are +2 AGI
and that's great. But I also got a +2 AGI ring, and I was wondering if I
should use it to replace one of my trusty Derv rings which are +2 dexterity.

Which affects attack and defense more, dexterity or agility?

__________________________
Moorgard, monk striving for virtue
